title: I have an idea for 1.8 Nebula maps!

replies.body: yh it could be like atlantis
replies.body_tagged: yh it could be like atlantis

replies.body: it would look cool but gameplay would be shit :c sorry but its true, the slow moving in water is annoying, especially when you gotta spam your space button so you don't since down or float up :c.
replies.body_tagged: it would look cool but gameplay would be shit :c sorry but its true, the slow moving in water is annoying, especially when you gotta spam your space button so you don't since down or float up :c.

replies.body: It would be cool it would had depth strider boots along with an infinite water breathing and night vision potion effects
replies.body_tagged: It would be cool it would had depth strider boots along with an infinite water breathing and night vision potion effects

replies.body:
I believe that two build teams, as well as myself, are making maps like this. More people could be doing it, tho.

Also, people...don't judge gameplay before you've actually played it...
